<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/#a61a5ea8046e1a487e39c75b2af78bef9a241ba3270d1998e2060a9e411f773006">OTHER</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Information about the last instruction(s) that wrote to a particular</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// regunit. In straight-line code there will only be one such instruction, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when control flow converges we merge the delay information from each path</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to represent the union of the worst-case delays of each type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a07cf6091a2788656eb4530ee4846a5b1">DelayInfo</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// One larger than the maximum number of (non-TRANS) VALU instructions we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can encode in an s&#95;delay&#95;alu instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a32bbbf7da4ad61a76cce07a336f8b9f7"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a32bbbf7da4ad61a76cce07a336f8b9f7">VALU&#95;MAX</a> = 5;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// One larger than the maximum number of TRANS instructions we can encode in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an s&#95;delay&#95;alu instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a990d7b1dba90a47ef530024145a016b4"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a990d7b1dba90a47ef530024145a016b4">TRANS&#95;MAX</a> = 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// One larger than the maximum number of SALU cycles we can encode in an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// s&#95;delay&#95;alu instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#acf9f5d59a24be46cbac8a6d800992d50"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#acf9f5d59a24be46cbac8a6d800992d50">SALU&#95;CYCLES&#95;MAX</a> = 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it was written by a (non-TRANS) VALU, remember how many clock cycles</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are left until it completes, and how many other (non-TRANS) VALU we have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// seen since it was issued.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#af8c75e701c9edc69fb919b5ba944f5cc"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#af8c75e701c9edc69fb919b5ba944f5cc">VALUCycles</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#ad2720f790c61cec3b607f094725e22a9"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#ad2720f790c61cec3b607f094725e22a9">VALUNum</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a32bbbf7da4ad61a76cce07a336f8b9f7">VALU&#95;MAX</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it was written by a TRANS, remember how many clock cycles are left</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// until it completes, and how many other TRANS we have seen since it was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// issued.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a5a83984d6fe52683f6ead034a535eb5e"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a5a83984d6fe52683f6ead034a535eb5e">TRANSCycles</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a476491112db2775de6b2003ae62341c1"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a476491112db2775de6b2003ae62341c1">TRANSNum</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a990d7b1dba90a47ef530024145a016b4">TRANS&#95;MAX</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also remember how many other (non-TRANS) VALU we have seen since it was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// issued. When an instruction depends on both a prior TRANS and a prior</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-TRANS VALU, this is used to decide whether to encode a wait for just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// one or both of them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a327a68baee6f61f592a78c93e9cdfbb6"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a327a68baee6f61f592a78c93e9cdfbb6">TRANSNumVALU</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a32bbbf7da4ad61a76cce07a336f8b9f7">VALU&#95;MAX</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it was written by an SALU, remember how many clock cycles are left</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// until it completes.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a7b51fd4bd2aedd09beb93b3f5ab0d257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a7b51fd4bd2aedd09beb93b3f5ab0d257">operator==</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a07cf6091a2788656eb4530ee4846a5b1">DelayInfo</a> &amp;RHS)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#af8c75e701c9edc69fb919b5ba944f5cc">VALUCycles</a> == RHS.VALUCycles &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#ad2720f790c61cec3b607f094725e22a9">VALUNum</a> == RHS.VALUNum &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">             <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a327a68baee6f61f592a78c93e9cdfbb6">TRANSNumVALU</a> == RHS.TRANSNumVALU &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a870fc34a3ab61ee4003b6aa1d7536c4f">SALUCycles</a> == RHS.SALUCycles;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a3344e090d03f3a1e0d179a244f93855e"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a3344e090d03f3a1e0d179a244f93855e">operator!=</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a07cf6091a2788656eb4530ee4846a5b1">DelayInfo</a> &amp;RHS)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !(&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> == RHS); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Merge another DelayInfo into this one, to represent the union of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// worst-case delays of each type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#ab2f970d3531548ca857ac0f9de4f251e"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#ab2f970d3531548ca857ac0f9de4f251e">merge</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a07cf6091a2788656eb4530ee4846a5b1">DelayInfo</a> &amp;RHS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#af8c75e701c9edc69fb919b5ba944f5cc">VALUCycles</a> = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#af8c75e701c9edc69fb919b5ba944f5cc">VALUCycles</a>, RHS.VALUCycles);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#ad2720f790c61cec3b607f094725e22a9">VALUNum</a> = std::min(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#ad2720f790c61cec3b607f094725e22a9">VALUNum</a>, RHS.VALUNum);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when issuing a (non-TRANS) VALU, else 0 IsTRANS should be 1 when issuing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a TRANS, else 0 Cycles is the number of cycles it takes to issue the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction.  Return true if there is no longer any useful delay info.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A map from regunits to the delay info for that regunit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delaystate"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delaystate">DelayState</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap/#a85df799e12328134e480949907bb1eef">DenseMap</a>&lt;unsigned, DelayInfo&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Merge another DelayState into this one by merging the delay info for each</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Wait for a TRANS instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Delay.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a476491112db2775de6b2003ae62341c1">TRANSNum</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a990d7b1dba90a47ef530024145a016b4">DelayInfo::TRANS&#95;MAX</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Imm |= 4 + Delay.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a476491112db2775de6b2003ae62341c1">TRANSNum</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Wait for a VALU instruction (if it&#39;s more recent than any TRANS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction that we&#39;re also waiting for).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Delay.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#ad2720f790c61cec3b607f094725e22a9">VALUNum</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a32bbbf7da4ad61a76cce07a336f8b9f7">DelayInfo::VALU&#95;MAX</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Delay.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#ad2720f790c61cec3b607f094725e22a9">VALUNum</a> &lt;= Delay.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a327a68baee6f61f592a78c93e9cdfbb6">TRANSNumVALU</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm &amp; 0xf)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Imm |= Delay.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#ad2720f790c61cec3b607f094725e22a9">VALUNum</a> &lt;&lt; 7;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Imm |= Delay.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#ad2720f790c61cec3b607f094725e22a9">VALUNum</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Wait for an SALU instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Delay.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a870fc34a3ab61ee4003b6aa1d7536c4f">SALUCycles</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Delay.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a870fc34a3ab61ee4003b6aa1d7536c4f">SALUCycles</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#acf9f5d59a24be46cbac8a6d800992d50">DelayInfo::SALU&#95;CYCLES&#95;MAX</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm &amp; 0x780) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have already encoded a VALU and a TRANS delay. There&#39;s no room in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the encoding for an SALU delay as well, so just drop it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm &amp; 0xf) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Imm |= (Delay.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a870fc34a3ab61ee4003b6aa1d7536c4f">SALUCycles</a> + 8) &lt;&lt; 7;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Imm |= Delay.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuinsertdelayalu-cpp-/amdgpuinsertdelayalu/delayinfo/#a870fc34a3ab61ee4003b6aa1d7536c4f">SALUCycles</a> + 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t emit the s&#95;delay&#95;alu instruction if there&#39;s nothing to wait for.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Imm)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastDelayAlu;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we only need to wait for one instruction, try encoding it in the last</span></CodeLine>
